translations: [物] 渗透；[物] 渗透性；渗透作用

phrs.translation: 倒转渗透器；反渗透装置

sentences.sentence: Water passes into the roots of a plant by osmosis.
One really interesting adaptation is the ability to reverse the process of osmosis.
sentences.translation: 一项非常有趣的适应机能是逆渗透能力。

sentences.sentence: Instead of freshwater moving out of the plant cells, salt from the seawater enters, reverse osmosis, and this actually strengthens the cells.
sentences.translation: 海水不仅不能抽走植物细胞里的水分，海水中的盐分反而会进入细胞内部，这就是所谓的反渗透。这种反渗透能力增加了细胞的强度。
